Interaction Event Types¶

S4CLInteractionOutcomeEvent¶

class S4CLInteractionOutcomeEvent(interaction: interactions.base.interaction.Interaction, outcome: interactions.utils.outcome.InteractionOutcome, outcome_result: interactions.utils.outcome_enums.OutcomeResult)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon a Sim running an interaction.

property interaction¶

An instance of an Interaction.

is_failure() → bool¶

Determine if the outcome was a failure.

is_success() → bool¶

Determine if the outcome was a success.

property outcome¶

The outcome of the interaction.

property outcome_result¶

The result of an interaction.

S4CLInteractionQueuedEvent¶

class S4CLInteractionQueuedEvent(interaction: interactions.base.interaction.Interaction, interaction_queue: interactions.interaction_queue.InteractionQueue)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon a Sim running an interaction.

property interaction¶

An instance of an Interaction.

property interaction_queue¶

The Interaction Queue of the Sim running the interaction.

S4CLInteractionRunEvent¶

class S4CLInteractionRunEvent(interaction: interactions.base.interaction.Interaction, interaction_queue: interactions.interaction_queue.InteractionQueue)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon a Sim running an interaction.

property interaction¶

An instance of an Interaction.

property interaction_queue¶

The Interaction Queue of the Sim running the interaction.
